callout.remove: Remove the type and keep a simple blockquote
callout.strong: Convert the type to a simple strong text
callout.title: Callout type

commands.editor: Copy selected text from edit view
commands.other: Copy selected text from opened view
commands.reading: Copy selected text from reading view

copyAsHTML: Copy as HTML instead of Markdown. Some options may not be available.

copyLinksAsText.desc: Adjust the way links are formatted when copying to the clipboard.
copyLinksAsText.external: Remove markup for internal links only
copyLinksAsText.title: Links format

hardBreaks.desc: Add a standard markdown line break (two spaces at the end of the line) at the end of each line.
hardBreaks.title: Hard breaks

hotkey.desc: Create a separate command for each mode. This allows you to assign a different hotkey for each mode. ⚠️️ You need to reload the plugin to apply the changes.
hotkey.title: Separate commands

log.empty: selectedText is empty // Fallback on activeWindow.getSelection().toString()
log.noHardBreaks: No hard breaks - Remove extra spaces at the end of each line

removeFootnotesLinks.desc: Adjust the way footnotes are formatted when copying them to the clipboard.
removeFootnotesLinks.format: Remove all links but keep contents as [^1]
removeFootnotesLinks.keep: Keep all links markup and contents
removeFootnotesLinks.remove: Remove all links markup and contents
removeFootnotesLinks.title: Footnotes format

spaceSize.desc: Number of spaces to be used for indentation. Use -1 to disable the conversion.
spaceSize.title: Space size

tabSpaceSize: Number of spaces to be used for indentation

unconventionalMarkdown.desc: Removed unconventional Markdown markup because they are not supported by all Markdown interpreters.
unconventionalMarkdown.title: Unconventional Markdown

view.desc: Choose on which view the conversion should be applied.
view.title: Apply settings

wikiToMarkdown.desc: Mandatory to edit the links when copying them to the clipboard. If disabled, the settings for links format will be ignored.
wikiToMarkdown.title: Convert wiki links to Markdown link
